mall_info.about:
Login / Register
About Us
Concept
A NEW ARTISTIC-CULTURAL LANDMARK AT WEST KOWLOON
D2 Place, the Cultural & Creativity Hub in West Kowloon, is the first Industrial Building Revitalization Project developed by Lawsgroup. Complete with 100,000 sq ft of retail space, 140,000 sq ft of commercial office space, the complex houses stylish fashion boutiques, creative markets, international F&B and lifestyle stores all under one roof. At D2 Place, we redefine the experience of shopping, dining and entertainment.
Featuring over 20,000 sqft. of event space and fascinating rooftop garden, D2 Place serves as a social hub to promote local culture and breed creativity.
Partner
FASHION FARM FOUNDATION
D2 Place strongly supports local creativity and serves as a platform to gather creative people and organizations which share the same passion for local culture and design. One of the sponsored entities is Fashion Farm Foundation (FFF) – an NGO founded by a group of enthusiastic entrepreneurs from the fashion and cultural creative industry – where its headquarters is located on the 9/F of D2 Place ONE with studios, co-working space and offices for individual designers.
We constantly collaborates with FFF on different events which support young local fashion designers to develop their own products, brand and business. Besides, the mall works closely with different organizers on various creative events and workshops.
Elevation
LAYOUT
A multifunctional complex comprising shops, showrooms, offices, studio workshops, specialty restaurant, sky garden and carparks, fulfils every desire of the turly discerning.
CONTACT US
MARKETING ENQUIRY
Email:
marketing@d2place.com
Tel: 2371 1876

mall_info.parking:
D2 Place Parking
D2 Place Parking
Login / Register
D2 Place Parking
優惠受條款及細則約束，按此了解詳情。
指定商戶包括：
條款及細則 Terms and Conditions:
1.顧客凡於 D2 PLACE ONE 或 D2 PLACE TWO 指定商戶* 累積消費滿港幣300元或以上(以最多2張單據計算)，可享用1小時免費泊車優惠；累積滿港幣500元或以上(以最多2張單據計算)，則可享用2小時免費泊車優惠。(*不包括於市集，POP-UP Stores或其他商場推廣活動之消費)；
Shoppers could enjoy 1 Hour of Free Parking for spending HK$300 or more, OR 2 Hours of Free Parking for spending HK$500 or more in designated shops* at D2 Place ONE or D2 Place TWO. The total spending amount could be accumulated by NOT more than 2 receipts (*NOT applicable to Weekend Markets, POP-UP Stores or other in-mall promotional activities);
2. 顧客需憑即日機印消費單據，於一期或二期商場地面泊車收費站登記。免費時段以外之泊車時間將以正常收費計算；
Shoppers must present On-day Printed Receipts to the G/F Shroff Office of D2 Place ONE or D2 Place TWO for redemption. Any additional parking time outside of the free period will be charged with regular fares;
3. 機印單據必須為正本並清晰印有商戶名稱、消費日期及金額。任何單據影印本、複印本、已被損毀或經塗改之單據、手寫單據、易辦事及信用咭收據存根等，恕不接受；
Printed receipts must be original and clearly show the shop name, issued date and spending amount. Photocopies, reprints, damaged or altered receipts, handwritten receipts, EPS or credit cards counterfoils are not accepted;
4. 此優惠只適用於私家車及客貨車類別；
This offer is applicable to private cars and light goods vehicle only;
5. 已用作泊車優惠之單據仍可用作參與其他商場推廣活動；
Receipts redeemed for Free Parking can be used for other redemption or promotional offer by D2 Place;
6. D2 PLACE 商戶及其職員均不能享用此項免費泊車優惠。D2 PLACE 保留隨時更改優惠條款及細則之權利。如有任何爭議，D2 PLACE 保留最終決定權。
D2 PLACE tenants and their staff are not eligible to participate in this offer. D2 PLACE reserves the rights to alter or amend the terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. In case of any dispute, the decision by D2 PLACE shall be final.

mall_info.leasing:
Leasing And Renting
Login / Register
Leasing And Renting
FOR SHOPS
UNIQUE MALL EXPERIENCE
D2 Place locates at the Kowloon west transportation hub, next to Lai Chi Kok MTR Exit D2 which is highly accessible, with parking spaces available for your added convenience. The five-storey mall provides customers with one-stop dining, shopping and enjoyment of life.  Adding the charm, the rooftop garden offers a comfortable and beautiful outdoor environment, exposure to different view of Lai Chi Kok.
Leasing Department
Tel: 2371 1999
E-mail: leasing@d2place.com
FOR VENUES
EXHIBITION & EVENT VENUES
The promotion and exhibition venues are composed of lightings, sound equipments and other facilities , ideal for corporate events, fashion show, product launches, workshops, markets, fashion show, themed parties, photo shoots and more.
D2 Place ONE
Rooftop Garden
Location: Rooftop, D2 Place ONE
Size: 12,000 sq.ft
The Space
Location: 2/F, D2 Place ONE
Size: 6,000 sq.ft
The Upper Stage
Location: 7/F, D2 Place ONE
Size: 8,000 sq.ft
Marketing Department
E-mail:
marketing@d2place.com
Tel: 2371 1876
DOWNLOAD BROCHURE
FOR POP-UP STORES
‘Dream it. Do it’
Pop-up Store Anniversary Campaign
High rent has turned most shopping malls in Hong Kong into a cookie-cutter and forced small and individual business operators to either shut down or relocate to suburban areas. In contrary, D2 Place strives to promote local culture through organizing regular creative events, and in 2016, we has successfully launched a Pop-up Store campaign “Dream It, Do It”which received over 100 applications and more than 20 local brands have started their first business here. To celebrate its anniversary, we are now offering a brand new pop-up store campaign for all entrepreneurs and local handcrafters.
Short-term Lease x Flexible Terms x Local Brands
“Dream It, Do It! Anniversary Campaign" offers a total of 15 Pop-up Store spaces, located along high traffic pathways within D2 Place ONE and D2 Place TWO. To differentiate from other in-mall tenants, D2 Pop-up Stores will be only applicable to Local Brands on short-term lease of 1 to 3 months. In addition to flexible terms and rental offers, D2 Place will also provide a list of furniture for shop owners to choose from for an easy startup.
In just less-than-a-year time, the Pop-up Store campaign received over 100 applications and is highly welcomed by the local creative industries and young entrepreneurs. 6 of those brands have become our valuable shop tenants from the Pop-up Stores campaign, including:
「Jennymadrose」－selling own-formulated handmade skincare & lifestyle products;
「Lisa & Sara」－selling own-formulated perfume, aroma diffuser and handmade soap;
「Jasoo 자수」－selling Korean style handmade gemstone & simple accessories;
「Fábula Select Shop」－offering handmade leather products, customization service and DIY workshops;
「Curate」－selling designer fashion items & accessories;
「Lost n Found 811」－featuring a wide collection of designer fashion items & lifestyle products.
Pop-up Store Campaign Details
• 15 Pop-up Stores open for application
• Short-term lease for 1 - 3 months only
• D2 Place ONE (1/F - 4/F) and D2 Place TWO (1/F)
• Free provision of basic furniture & display accessories
• Promotion & other operation supports
• Special Rental Offers
Leasing Department
Tel: 2371 1999
E-mail:
leasing@d2place.com
FOR BOOTHS
"D2 Place Weekend Markets" regularly organizes a variety of local markets, aiming to promote local culture and encourage young people to develop their own business. With the mission of "Small Shops with Big Ideas", D2 Place strived to create a new and ideal destination for everyone to spend their weekends.  We are welcome for any handcrafters, designers or artiste joining our big party!
Marketing Department
E-mail: weekendmarkets@d2place.com
APPLY NOW
